800: If there is a dark brown/brown/red stain on your underwear(panties) or clothes, it means your period gets started.
2400: Here are some things you can do.
4600: If available, take the stained clothes off and change into a clean one as soon as possible.
7400: Get rid of the blood with soap/laundry detergent
9000: under warm or slightly cold water
10500: as soon as possible because the blood is likely to soak through quickly.
13000: A period is a very natural phenomenon that every girl and woman experiences, but during the period, you might find it uncomfortable as you cannot control blood coming out.
14200: That is why sanitary products are here to help you
15400: to keep your daily life even in the period.
16600: There are a variety of products in the world,
17800: so you can use the most accessible and suitable one for yourself depending your surroundings(country, community, etc.)
19000: Click each sanitary products below and learn how to use them.
